query:
SELECT 
                    u.id,
                    u.name,
                    u.email,
                    u.department_id,
                    d.name as "department_name?",
                    u.role
                FROM users u
                LEFT JOIN departments d ON u.department_id = d.id
                WHERE u.tenant_id = $1 
                  AND u.id != $2
                  AND u.status = 'active'
                  AND u.department_id = ANY($3)
                  AND (LOWER(u.name) LIKE $4 OR LOWER(u.email) LIKE $4)
                ORDER BY u.name
                LIMIT 50
